violations.description: More than 1000 people in a single zone at any time.
violations.recommendation: Limit the number of people to less than or equal to 1000.

violations.description: Persons are nearby without proper badges.
violations.recommendation: Ensure only authorized persons with green, light blue, dark blue, purple, orange, or black badges enter the restricted zone.
Ensure all unattended items are removed.
Report and address the issue immediately.

compliant_rules.notes: All persons in work zones are wearing required PPE (hard hat, vest).

report.summary: The observation is non-compliant due to the presence of unauthorized personnel and unattended items. The risk score indicates a high level of risk.
